item.title: Useful Hacks
item.description: 🛠 How to connect an old HP (LaserJet 1018) to MacBook? ✍️ https://support.apple.com/kb/dl907?locale=en_US. This solution only worked for older OS.

item.title: 🧑🏼‍🎨 System Design
item.description: System design is very important for any IT specialist. Software engineers are not the only ones who get frequently asked about this when interviewed in some top IT companies.
